name: GIN Register DFM
query:
select 
    pr.gate_entry_no as "GateEntryNo:Link/Gate Entry",
    pr.date as "GateEntryDate:Date:100",
    pr.supplier_delivery_note as "BillNo:Data:100",
    pr.supplier_bill_no  as "Party Bill No",
    pr.supplier_invoice_date as "Party Bill Date:Date",
    pr.name as "GIN No:Link/Purchase Receipt:150",
  	pr.posting_date as "GIN Date:Date:100",
  	pi.purchase_order as "PO:data:100",
   	qi.report_date as "MRN Inspection Date:Date",
    pi.item_name as "Item:data:200",
	pi.item_code as "Part No:data:100",
	pi.item_group as "Group Name:data:100",
    item.category as "Category:data:100",
	pi.received_qty as "Recieved Quantity:Float:100",
	"INR" as "Currency:50",
	pi.rate as "Rate:Data:50",
    pi.stock_uom as "Unit:Data:50",
    pi.amount as "Grand Total:Float:100",
    pi.net_amount as "Net Total:Float:100",
    item.product_line as "Product Line",
    item.product_category as "Product Category",
    item.price_category as "Price Category",
    item.product_Variant as "Product Variant",
    item.promo_code as "Promo Code",
    item.item_sub_group as "Item sub Group"
from
	`tabPurchase Receipt` pr, `tabPurchase Receipt Item` pi ,`tabQuality Inspection` qi,`tabQuality Inspection Reading` qr,`tabItem` item
where
	pi.parent=pr.name and 
   qr.parent=qi.name and
   qi.reference_name=pr.name and
   item.item_name=pi.item_name
